level.text: The contracting officer may conduct pre-bid conferences to explain the procurement requirements.
The contracting officer shall announce pre-bid conferences in the IFB to all prospective bidders.
The contracting officer shall hold a pre-bid conference as early as possible after an IFB has been issued and before bids are due.
Nothing stated at the pre-bid conference shall change an IFB unless a change is made by the contracting officer by written amendment.
